get.operationId: Retrieves a list of credit applications modified within a date range, only includes attachment MetaData
get.description: Retrieve a list of credit applications modified within a date range, only includes attachment MetaData

parameters.name: startdatetime
parameters.description: Beginning of search range. Time should be in GMT format

parameters.name: enddatetime
parameters.description: End of search range. Time should be in GMT format.

500.description: Bad response from authorization server, or WSDL SOAP Fault error

401.description: Unauthorized or invalid client application credentials
